title: fieldset
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The fieldset element is used to group related elements within a form.

usageExamples.title: Basic Example
usageExamples.description: Create a fieldset with a legend and input elements inside.

usageExamples.title: With disabled attribute
usageExamples.code:
<fieldset disabled>
  <legend>Personal Information</legend>
  <label for="name">Name:</label>
  <input type="text" id="name" name="name">
</fieldset>
